name: Ski & Snowboard 2013
description:
Practice winter sports in a realistic 3D environment through 43 sport disciplines !

Challenge computer controlled competitors, play against friends or enter a time trial and see how your times stack up against the world on the online leaderboards.

Are you ready to take on the best in the world ?

Now, the sport, it's on your Apple tablet !

REALISTIC GRAPHICS
Ski & Snowboard 2013 immerses you in a winter sports atmosphere. You will evolve through detailed and realistic environment with animations to celebrate your records. Enjoy a 3D design which complements the great playability of best sports games. The game includes music and special crowd sound effects.

GAMEPLAY
Ski & Snowboard 2013 provides an intuitive gameplay system for both beginners and experienced players. It requires fast fingers, impeccable timing, and smart strategy to defeat your opponents and claim a victory.
Choose your character and keep playing to improve your skier’s agility so they can perform to their full potential.

GAME CENTER
Take a look at Leaderboard and see how your score ranks against your friends, as well as all players for each competition.

SPECIAL 2 PLAYERS MODE IN SPLIT SCREEN
Challenge your friends on the same screen with split-screen feature.

UNIVERSAL VERSION
Buy once and use on your iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad at no extra cost.

FULL VERSION
Download now the full version and get all 43 sports disciplines and all athletes unlocked.

IN-APP PURCHASES
Two in-app purchases to:
-unlock all 43 sports disciplines
-unlock all athletes
